Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Turn
public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements all the element of a turn game. His main method are executeMove and executeBuild which update the model the correspondent action.

      public int getNumberOfBuildings()

    • setWorkerGender

      public void setWorkerGender​(Gender workerGender)
      This method set the worker that will be used during the turn.
      Parameters:
      workerGender - the gender of the chosen worker

    • wantsToBuildDome

      public boolean wantsToBuildDome()

    • setWantsToBuildDome

      public void setWantsToBuildDome​(boolean wantsToBuildDome) throws InvalidBuildException
      This method set if the player wants to build a dome instead of the rules' level.
      Parameters:
      wantsToBuildDome - true if he wants to build a dome, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildException - if the player wants to build a dome but he isn't allowed to.

    • executeMove

      public void executeMove​(Direction direction) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidDirectionException, InvalidMoveException
      This method implements a Player's move
      Parameters:
      direction - where the player's Worker is going to move
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the worker try to move in a direction that is out out the board
      InvalidDirectionException - if there are some troubles of I/O.
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is invalid.

    • executeBuild

      public void executeBuild​(Direction direction) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidDirectionException, InvalidBuildException
      This method builds a construction on the Slot adjacent to the Worker, in the direction chosen.
      Parameters:
      direction - specifies the slot where to build
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the worker try to build in a direction that is out out the board
      InvalidDirectionException - if there are some troubles of I/O.
      InvalidBuildException - if building is not permitted.

    • checkIfWorkersAreParalyzed

      private void checkIfWorkersAreParalyzed()
      This method check if both the player's workers are paralyzed in every conditions. In that case, the player loses the game.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
